Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-32324 affecting package cups for versions less than 2.4.10-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-32324 affecting package cups for versions less than 2.4.10-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package cups is earlier than 2.4.10-1, affected by CVE-2023-32324
